Champagne
KRUG
Krug Grande Cuvée Champagne
Made from the finest wines from the Marne district of Champagne,
Krug Grande Cuvee is known throughout the world for its
unique qualities of elegance, fine mousse and distinctive flavour.
Skilful blending under the personal control of Henri Krug
makes the Grande Cuvee an exceptionally harmonious
champagne in the unique Krug style.
Red Wines
LOUISMAX
Chamberlin
Gevrey Chambertin La Justice 1989
Gevrey Chambertin at the northern end of the Côte de Nuits is
one of the great vinevards of the Burgundy area.
*The Pinot Noir grapes give this wine the typical notes of red berries
The colour is attractive and the maturation in oak has had a balancing effect.
The 1989 vintage is well regarded. lighter in style than the 1985.
thus resulung i an easv arinking and truv wine.
WINE LIST
Kendall-Jackson Grand Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 1994
The grapes used to produce the 1994 vintage Kendall Jackson Grand
Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon were grown in California's best mountain vineyards alongside
the famed Napa and Sonoma valleys. This is a distinctive red wine which offers concentrated flavours
of black cherry, blueberry and plum fruit with subtle chocolate and toasty oak notes.

GREEN POINT
Green Point Yarra Valley Chardonnay 1996
The 1996 Green Point Chardonnay was produced from
yello in donna, tapes comin the a rarel fein Dustrald it at. This wine
is a perfect accompaniment to seafood and white meat dishes.
MEURSAULT
Louis Max Meursault
Les Casse-Têtes 1990
This wine is classed as one of the most famous white wines of France and is produced
with tints of greenish gold, in as characterized by orla somas of ripe trait and dis olinating flavour
of hazelnuts. This particular well balanced vintage is a dream and definitely one to remember.
It is Cathay Pacific policy not to serve alcoholic beverages to persons under 18 years of age.
properties.sfomuseum:description: Menu and wine list issued by Cathay Pacific Airways, Vancouver - Hong Kong route; red and black cover with color photographic image of asparagus spears; lunch and dinner menu items include pan-fried salmon, grilled beef, Hainanese chicken rice, and pasta with pesto.a. menu; menu number: CX839-3287 F; class: first; undatedb. wine list; menu number CX880, 881, 828, 829, 872, 873, 882, 883; class: first; date: 1-6-99
